item.title: first
item.description: Inaugural blog post - :wave: Hi there. This is my new dotcom site. I will try to post regularly about programming and software development For now, my first venture is setting up a new static site using Hugo, a tool built in Go. Previously, my site was a static site built with Middleman, a ruby-based tool. Follow along as I port over content to this new site, hosted on Github Pages.
